snippet: The Pirates blew a lead in the ninth inning to ensure a 20th straight losing season, a major North American professional sports record.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Cincinnati Reds defeat Pittsburgh Pirates, 4-3, to clinch home-field advantage in the National League division series; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Pirates blew a lead in the ninth inning to ensure a 20th straight losing season, a major North American professional sports record.

headline.seo: Pirates’ Run of Losing Seasons Hits 20
headline.main: Pirates’ Run of Losing Seasons Hits 20
